Note: For the version in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 647.
_description: Gospel for Fifth Sunday after Trinity in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
Saynte luke þe gude gospellereTellis þat i sall saie
                    ȝou here…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…Ihesu criste vs þidir ledeAnd ȝelde vs þare
                    oure lange mede
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Luc þe gospelereSeiþ þat I schal telle on
                    here…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Vre lord crist vs þider ledeAnd ȝelde vs þere
                    vs longe mede. Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title: Cum turbe multe venirent ad Ihesu (f. 200va)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
SEynt Luk þe gospellereTelles þis day als ȝe may
                    here…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…Oure lorde ihesu þedire vs ledeAnd graunte vs alle
                    þere in oure mede
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title:
Dominica va post festum trinitatis secundum Lucam (p.
                    235)

CULDd11.First Lines:
SEynt Luke þe good Gospellereseyth þat I schal telle
                    ȝow hereIn oure Gospel of this dayI rede ȝe here what I wile
                    say…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…oure lord crist vs thedir lede& ȝelde vs there oure
                    longe mede
CULDd11.Attributed Title:
Dominica quinta post festum sancte Trinitatis Euangelium secundum Lucam
                        capitulo 5o (f. 151)

CULGg531.First Lines:
Sayne luke þe gude gospellereTelles þat I sall tell
                    þu here…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…Oure lorde ihesu vs þider ledeAnd ȝelde vs
                    þare oure laude mede
CULGg531.Attributed Title: Þis es þe gospell of þe fyfte sonunday (f. 99)

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
SEint luc þe gospelereSeiþ þat I schal telle
                    ȝow here…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…Vre lord crist vs þider ledeAnd ȝelde vs þere
                    vre longe mede. Amen
BLAdd22283.Attributed Title: Cum turbe multe venirent ad Ihesu (f. 5va)
BLAdd22283.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library MS Add. 22283 (‘Simeon’).
         2014; http://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?ref=Add_MS_22283.

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
Saint luke þe gude gospellerTelles þat I sall say
                    ȝow her…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…Ihesu crist vs þider ledeAnd ȝelde vs þare our
                    lange mede

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Saynt Luke telles þe gude gospelleretelles þat I sall say
                    ȝowe here…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…oure lorde ihesu vs þider ledeand ȝelde vs þar
                    oure mede
MinULZ822.Attributed Title:
Dominica quinta post festum sancte trinitatis Secundum Lucam (f.
                        109v)

HunHM129.First Lines:
Seynt Luc þe gode gospellereTellith þat I schall tell
                    ȝow here…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…Oure loueryd ihesu þeddyr vs ledeAnd ȝelde vs
                    þare oure lange mede
HunHM129.Note: Heading and Latin quotation precede at bottom of f. 122.
